creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of firemen
description: short, navy blue tightly quilted robe with intersecting, horizontal and vertical off-white line pattern, tan Japanese characters on collar, and outline of Japanese character on back center; red-brown interior lining with same tan pattern
markings: interior PR, Thomas Murray Collection label: JAP 6214A
medium: Cloth: cotton; sashiko (decorative reinforcement stitching), tsutsugaki (freehand resist)
title: Fireman's short coat (hikeshi-banten) [from a set]
